data.content:
noun
plural -offs
[count] a kick that starts play in a game (such as American football or soccer)
a long kickoff
The kickoff (of the game) is at 1:00. [=the game begins at 1:00]
the start of something
At his campaign kickoff, the senator gave a passionate speech about combating poverty.
His speech marked the kickoff of his campaign. - see also kick off at 1kick
